tool_description: Calculates optimal reorder points considering demand forecasts, lead times, safety stock requirements, and inventory policy constraints.
error_messages: Invalid demand forecast: Must be a positive number
Invalid safety stock: Must be non-negative
Invalid lead time: Must be positive
Invalid review period: Must be positive integer between 1 and 30
usage: Input forecast_demand, safety_stock, and lead_time_days. Adjust review_period for periodic review systems.

buffer_coverage.description: Days of demand coverage provided by reorder point

risk_assessment.description: Risk level assessment: low, medium, high
